# DooptyDo - Flutter Duplicate File Finder

## Project Overview
Flutter app for finding and removing duplicate files on mobile (Android/iOS) and desktop (Windows/macOS/Linux) platforms.

## Todo List
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold Flutter project
- [ ] Customize project for duplicate file detection
- [ ] Install required extensions
- [ ] Compile the project
- [ ] Create and run task
- [ ] Launch the project
- [ ] Ensure documentation is complete

## Key Requirements
- Multi-platform support (Mobile + Desktop)
- File system access with proper permissions
- Duplicate detection via hash comparison
- Firebase backend integration
- Delete individual or bulk duplicate files
